name: Lemon Mint
description: A cold, tangy blend of freshly squeezed lemons and garden-fresh mint leaves. Served chilled, it’s the perfect thirst-quencher on a hot day.

name: Iced Coffee
description: A bold yet smooth cold brew coffee served over ice. Lightly sweetened with optional milk or syrup — ideal for coffee lovers looking for a refreshing boost.

name: Strawberry Smoothie
description: A thick and creamy smoothie made with real strawberries and yogurt. Naturally sweet and full of flavor, perfect as a sweet drink or light snack.

name: Mango Juice
description: A smooth and naturally sweet juice made from ripe mangoes. Served cold and packed with tropical flavor — a true summer favorite.
